title.value: Влияние казеиновой кислотной сыворотки на потребление, переваримость и использование питательных веществ корма молодняком крупного рогатого скота
Influence of casein acid whey on consumption, digestibility and use of forage nutrients by young growth of cattle
Influence of casein acid whey on consumption, digestibility and use of forage nutrients by young growth of cattle

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Glinkova, A.M., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breeding (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented data on studying the influence of casein hydrochloric acid and sulfuric serum feeding on palatability and digestibility of feeds by fattening young cattle. The use of casein acid serum for feeding young cattle had a positive effect on digestibility of feeds, allowing obtaining the ratios of digestibility at the level of 45-78%. Experiences were spent on a physiological court yard at RUP 'Scientific-practical Centre of the National Academy of Sciences of Belarus on Animal Husbandry'. In physiological experience fed: to 1 control group - haylage, mixed fodder (the basic ration), and to skilled groups in addition to the basic ration - casein whey in different quantities. Feeding in addition to the basic diet with casein serum in the amount of 7 kg per animal daily had more positive effect on the use of nutrients than in animals with a greater rate of feed intake.
